# PED::SET_HEAD_BLEND_EYE_COLOR

## Summary
Sets the specified eye color index on the given ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** color

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Used for freemode (online) characters.

For some reason, the scripts use a rounded float for the index.
Indexes:
1. black
2. very light blue/green
3. dark blue
4. brown
5. darker brown
6. light brown
7. blue
8. light blue
9. pink
10. yellow
11. purple
12. black
13. dark green
14. light brown
15. yellow/black pattern
16. light colored spiral pattern
17. shiny red
18. shiny half blue/half red
19. half black/half light blue
20. white/red perimter
21. green snake
22. red snake
23. dark blue snake
24. dark yellow
25. bright yellow
26. all black
28. red small pupil
29. devil blue/black
30. white small pupil
31. glossed over
